matrices

Class Matrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • matrices.Matrix

  • public class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Matrix(double[][] matrix)
      Creates an m x n matrix object from the provided matrix.
      Matrix(int m, int n)
      Creates an m x n matrix with zeros every spot.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void display()
      Displays a formatted matrix to System.out of the format String.format("%9.3f", matrix[i][j]) for each element.
